org.opendaylight.controller.usermanager.northbound

Class UserManagerNorthbound

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.usermanager.northbound.UserManagerNorthbound

  • public class UserManagerNorthbound
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides REST APIs to manage users. This API will only be availalbe via HTTPS.

    Authentication scheme : HTTP Basic
    Authentication realm : opendaylight
    Transport : HTTPS

    HTTPS Authentication is disabled by default so to use UserManager APIs turn on HTTPS on Web Server

      • addLocalUser

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addLocalUser(UserConfig userConfigData)
        Add a user
        Parameters:
        userConfigData - the UserConfig user config structure in request body
        Returns:
        Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code 
         Example:

 Request URL:
 https://localhost/controller/nb/v2/usermanager/users

 Request body in XML:
  <userConfig>
      <user>testuser</user>
      <roles>Network-Admin</roles>
      <password>pass!23</password>
  </userConfig>

 Request body in JSON:
 {
  "user":"testuser",
  "password":"pass!23",
  "roles":[
       "Network-Admin"
       ]
 }

      • removeLocalUser

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeLocalUser(java.lang.String userToBeRemoved)
        Delete a user
        Parameters:
        userName - name of user to be deleted
        Returns:
        Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code 
         Example:

 Request URL:
 https://localhost/controller/nb/v2/usermanager/users/testuser
